definition: Fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing.
Excessively talkative, especially on trivial matters.
A person or thing that signals the approach of another.
Harmless; not likely to offend or provoke.
To put into a situation of danger or risk.
The sound of a bell, especially when rung solemnly for a death.
Looking or sounding sad and dismal.
Showing great attention to detail; very precise.
